name: Meks Simple Flickr Widget
author: Meks

sections.description:
Quickly display your Flickr photos inside WordPress widget. No authorization required (only provide your user id).

Features

  • No authorization required (only provide your user id)
  • Support both user Flickr users and Flickr groups
  • Change thumbnail size
  • Caching system integrated for better performance

Simple Flickr Widget plugin is created by Meks

Live example?

You can see Simple Flickr Widget live example on our Voice theme demo website
sections.installation:
1. Upload meks-simple-flickr-widget.zip to plugins via WordPress admin panel or upload unzipped folder to your wp-content/plugins/ folder
  2. Activate the plugin through the “Plugins” menu in WordPress
  3. Go to Appearance -> Widgets to add and setup the widget
sections.faq: For any questions, error reports and suggestions please visit https://mekshq.com/contact
sections.changelog:
1.3

  • WP 6.3 compatibility tested
  • Patched a minor security issue

1.2

  • WP 5.8 compatibility

1.1.4

  • Added notification for meks plugins

1.1.3

  • Added an option to randomize photos on display
  • Added support for websites using https protocol
  • Improved: Now you can use “0” (zero) as height value to enable “auto” height for photos

1.1.2

  • Full compatibility with WordPress 4.3

1.1

  • Added support for Flickr group feeds

1.0.3

  • Full compatibility with new WordPress customizer in WP 3.9+

1.0.2

  • Added translation files (en_US)

1.0

  • Initial release
